The protagonist as a new leader makes different encounters to find money for survival where he got arrested.
His set free with the help an uptown girl JULIAN whom they later develop affection.
As time passes, he decides to drop the drug business aside for good and focus living a positive life as boxer.
In the path of success to his dream as an International Boxing Champion, things worsen when his former boss FACE blackmails him by abducting ghetto brother BUGGIE with interest of using him transport drugs outside the country. He beats odds offering his African Title Match prize to liberate the brother and later transformed his ghetto family.
